Translations.Text: He bol Jeden zriadit zahrada trellised untrellised palm strom zozat inak chut olives pomegranate! -Ovocie bol a podobne dissimilar Jestn ich ovocie dat due alms dni zatva nie pusty anything! He nie laska wasters
Some zivy inventar zasoba ona transportation i mat rad zahon latka! Jestn GOD's provisions ona nie nasledovat steps Satan; he bol tvoj zapalisty enemy
laskavy zivy inventar 2 laskavy sheep 2 laskavy goats say Je it 2 muzsky He zakazat 2 zena contents wombs 2 zena? Tell mna co ona zauzlit ona bol truthful

zretel 2 laskavy camels 2 laskavy cattle say Je it 2 muzsky He zakazat 2 zena contents wombs 2 zena? Ona je svedok when GOD decreed such zakaz ona? Kto zly than those invent such laicky je attribute them GOD They thus zmylit ludia znalost. GOD NIE guide such ZLY LUDIA
